website_summaries.verdict: A smooth microfiber comforter that suits those with allergies. Affordably priced.

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - Received a used, dirty blanket - embarrassing!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter was ordered as a Christmas present. When the recipient opened it, she found makeup stains on the blanket - it reeked of fabric softener - and was dingy. The blanket had been shoved into the bag and not properly folded. It was clearly used. I was mortified. Unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole E Davis

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping like a baby!
customer_reviews.text: Came two weeks ago and started Fluffy as ever- still is!! Pleasantly surprised with the amount of fluff for down alt! No smells, lots of even fill. Only downside is no ties for the duvet. Totally worth the money/ amazing deal!! My picture doesn't do it justice! PS.. I never write reviews but I loved this so much!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: I washed it for the first time on gentle cycle. There are now multiple holes throughout the comforter. Because blankets must be washed I recommend that Amazon discontinue the sale of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks just the picture
customer_reviews.text: It’s soft, light weight, and not too hot for Texas in August if you keep your thermostat in the 60s. I sleep alone so that may be different if it were for two people. I bought the king size for my queen size bed. EDIT 6 WEEKS LATER: I have now been turning the air down 4 more degrees to keep it cooler bc this comforter leaves me drenched with sweat. I love how soft and lift weight it is. But it unfortunately traps body heat—big time. :(
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Great Duvet insert!
customer_reviews.text: I was beyond impressed with this duvet insert. I normally have bought my kids theirs at PBTEEN (the alternative down) and the quality is so much better on this one. It doesn’t go flat and it’s cheaper. Well the price difference is night and day. The pbteen one is close to $200 with taxes and delivery. I thought I was buying this for the meantime only, well let me tell you something, I’m keeping it. I’m sure I’ll be sewing on the cords like the Pottery Barn ones come with because it helps with keeping it flat inside the duvet.
customer_reviews.author: YOPORO

customer_reviews.title: NOT HYPO ALLERGENIC AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: We used for a year and change, and then my allergen sensitive husband became quite allergic to this comforter. With other hyper-allergenic bedding, if I washed it I could keep this from happening. This one became banished from the bed room, it's useless now. I guess I can use it for guests without allergies. If you are purchasing for other reasons, it was comfy and warm and cheap. But now I'm cold in my bed because it's not allowed in the bed anymore from making him feel sick.
customer_reviews.author: S. B. Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: It says for all seasons but I I feel it’s getting too warm for spring. In summer this will be too hot. Also, I ordered a full/queen size for my queen sized bed which has a box spring. The comforter covers the top of the mattress but not the box spring. If you want it to cover the box spring too then order a size up. Plus, it came with a little stain that did not come out after the wash. Some of the squares bunch up after the wash since the square sizes are slightly bigger than I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Susana

customer_reviews.title: I do like this duvet and it's kept us warm in our ...
customer_reviews.text: I do like this duvet and it's kept us warm in our 65 degree house, but if you bought anything larger than a queen/king, I would strongly recommend NOT washing it in the washing machine. I bought a king and tried to wash it and I ended up with a duvet that had 2-3 tears in it. I followed the washing instructions perfectly. I exchanged it and do not plan on washing the new one. Soooooo, unfortunately if you have a need to wash it, you may consider bringing it to the dry cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: Anacan

customer_reviews.title: Potential Health Hazard ?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these. A king and a twin Here is what is REALLY BAD about this product; not sure what the fill is made from but there is a very fine fabric dust from the internal fill that consistently seeps out through the cover. It’s very messy and certainly not something we want to breathe in. It’s almost as fine a talcum powder in consistency. Cleaning as per instructions did not remedy the issue. Pros: . Very Thick and heavy . Low priced Cons: . Extensive fabric dust leaches out from the fill . Messy . Too thick and heavy . Comforter does breathe . Expect heavy sweating
customer_reviews.author: Frank M.

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter until you have to wash it
customer_reviews.text: I washed this according to the instructions and after the first wash a small tear appeared. I sewed up the tear and after the second wash the corners completely tore apart and half of the stuffing came out.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Maria Von Trapp would love this comforter (in Texas)
customer_reviews.text: As a child, I always wanted a bed comforter like the one Maria Von Trapp had (Julie Andrews) when she was singing "Favorite Things" in the movie Sound of Music. I found that comforter and it is one of my "favorite things"! (I had to say that) While probably not warm enough for cold Austrian winters, it suits me just fine here in Texas. I'm using it as a duvet insert and I have a mattress warmer for the winter. Lightweight, soft and fluffy. Another excellent product from Superior.
customer_reviews.author: ssalava

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, very soft, but doesn't feel like down
customer_reviews.text: The shipping time was outstanding. The blanket is smooth and very soft to the touch. The weight of it does not seem warm enough for winter months, but on cool nights or summer nights would be sufficient. We returned this though because it advertises itself as a down alternative. While yes, it is an alternative to down, it is still just polyester fibers that fill it. The kind that over time might bunch up in the wash. I was sad to return it, but we are looking for the down alternative material that actually feels like down.
customer_reviews.author: aavery

customer_reviews.title: Not fluffy! Giant marshmallow!
customer_reviews.text: The blanket feels like soft and squishy styrofoam. It does not transfer body heat well, thus it can become uncomfortably stuffy very quickly. The pictures make it seem so fluffy and soft but it's really more like a plastic marshmallow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this comforter! It feels weighted and cozy but is not to warm. Our daughter has been refusing to fall asleep in her own bed because ours is too comfortable now! It’s a good thing this comforter is so generously sized. I did see reviews which had issues machine washing which I luckily had no problem with in my regular sized washer. Extremely happy with our purchase. Edit; updating my review since I’ve purchased it has been washed several times without issue on the last wash it completely ripped, disappointed. However I repurchased simply because of how comfortable and large this comforter is.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Oh my god so soft
customer_reviews.text: Now normally I'm the kind of girl who likes crisp, cool sheets. Percale is my jam. But I finally got rid of my 10 year old comforter and needed a new one. I got this one because of the number of reviews. When I took it out of the packaging, I was sad that it was just kind of mooshy and soft. And then I slept under it. OMG, y'all, it's like sleeping under a velvet cloud. Even on the couple of hot nights we've had, I've cranked up the AC and the fan so I could keep sleeping under it. I'm so happy it's fall and cooler at night now. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks can be deceiving
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical to order thes ed because of do many different opinions of this insert as well as reading reviews for countless others, but something told me try this. I ordered on a whim and it worked. After ordering 2 for my nephew's room, I ordered 2 more for my kids and 2 for myself. These worked out great! Relief!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn D.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, lightweight, but warm
customer_reviews.text: Our couch backs up to a large window and the winters are cold in Colorado, so I got this to use on the couch so I don't freeze. It's super comfortable, lightweight and warm. I got the twin and cut it down to fit the couch better. My cats also love it - we call it the marshmallow because it's so fluffy. Good product, good price. Would buy again. I also purchased the AmazonBasics Organic Sateen Cotton Duvet Comforter Cover Set, Watercolor Vine duvet cover (pictured) so it's so easy to keep the comforter clean. Another great buy at a good price to make it all worth together.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: A few things to know about
customer_reviews.text: Soft comforter, big for a full bed. Great if you're looking for a soft feeling blanket. Didn't know it was 100% Polyester and is made in China. Wish I bought something that is cotton or something that's not synthetic. It does have a plasticky smell when you open it, had to open the window for a few hours to let the smell be gone. One week update: still a soft blanket, although not as fluffy as I first bought and it become quite thin, doesn't give you that puffy feel. :( Polyester fluff ball came out once and a while. Latest update: bought two and it is fluffier but you will sweat like crazy! One preferred for all season.
customer_reviews.author: Jumpman

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this comforter a few days in the summer heat but so far I've slept really well with it using the AC and my ceiling fan. I like my blanket with a little bit of weight so did not want something paper thin. This is about medium and its really soft and snuggly. Great deal for the price. Also, some people said get a King size for a Queen but that doesnt make any sense unless you have a bedframe that sits really high and want it to hang over. I ordered Queen and it fits perfect on my Queen bed.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rizzardi

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t say it’s lightweight, but it’s not super heavy. It was what I expected- heavier than a normal bedspread but not heavy. Looks and feels expensive, super soft and cozy, and it washes fine in my normal washer and dryer (although I dry on a lower setting to maintain it, and have to flip it around and dry it maybe 2-3x to get it fully dried). Plan to get them for guest rooms when I move out because it’s so soft and perfect! If you’re looking for the perfect bedspread you found it
customer_reviews.author: Karlee

customer_reviews.title: SOOOOOO COMFY!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm very satisfied with my purchase. I was looking in-store at comforters that cost three and four times as much money, and I'm glad I went the more affordable route instead. The fabric is soft and the filling reminds me of more luxurious down comforters. It washes and dries well with a gentle and low-heat cycle. I bought the Queen/Full-size version for a full-size bed. It's a little big, as you can see from the picture but it still fits well. This is just something to consider if your bed is lower to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: BEST COMFORTER I'VE EVER OWNED but will Rip when washed.
customer_reviews.text: The is the comforter of my dreams. I was more than thrilled with the texture and the size. Its the Super comfy fluffy comforter you've seen in movies and hotels, its perfect but after buying two, the first wash on gentle cycle, I opened up my washer and to my horror it ripped, though it says it can be washed, I got a replacement and it ripped as well. With A heavy heart I have to find something else as great as this under $50 or maybe third time is the charm?? I usually wash my comforters every two weeks. I've bought cheaper comforters that never ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Egbu

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: OMG we love it! It's so soft, plush. We're in late April in Colorado and it's not to hot, not to cold. My fiance and I were raving to each other the other night on how much better we both slept because of how comfortable it was! A great buy and especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: I’d pay twice as much!
customer_reviews.text: Easy would have paid twice as much for this if I saw it at a store. Great weight, warmth & is quiet. Our previous comforter had a loud exterior fabric- this is quiet. Perfect weight. Not too light and not too heavy. My husband and I both sleep in shorts & a tshirt and the temperature is nice. If you tend to overheat, I can’t say this would be a good fit. If you have no problems with that, you should be fine with this comforter. Right now it is fall/winter, I’m curious about summer. But we usually don’t sleep with a comforter in the summer anyways.
customer_reviews.author: khitch

customer_reviews.title: Several holes after washing and filling is coming out.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this duvet insert at first. It’s a little hot for Alabama weather (even in the winter) but I removed it from the duvet cover I purchased and it was bearable. My biggest complaint and disappointment is after I washed it 6 months after having it, there are several holes in it and the filling is now coming out. I followed the directions very carefully and was not expecting to see the damage when I pulled it out of the wash. If this wasn’t an issue, I would give this item 4 stars (would give 5 if they described it as a medium weight and a warmer sleeping duvet).
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: ... inexpensive duvet insert has provided us with the most comfortable sleep of any we've owned over the past 20 ...
customer_reviews.text: We are stunned that this inexpensive duvet insert has provided us with the most comfortable sleep of any we've owned over the past 20 years--and we've bought everything from alternative to plus down-filled for hundreds of dollars! It is lightweight, it keeps you warm when you need it most (and that's saying a lot for this winter in Chicago!), it doesn't make you sweat--ever, and that's amazing. It is generously sized and fits our dual-king perfectly. I am so impressed that we're buying additional ones as house-warming gifts for family moving to this area.
customer_reviews.author: Caring grandma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect weight and warmth
customer_reviews.text: I can't express how much I love love love this comforter. I have diabetic neuropathy and can't stand a lot of weight on my feet at night . This is lightweight, fluffy and warm . I just purchased a duvet cover because I want this comforter to last forever . Looks like great quality all the stitching is good and I'm sure that if I have it cleaned professionally it will turn out great . I would not hesitate to buy another one . I did purchase a king size for my queen size bed because I like it to hang further down.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: VERY SOFT.
customer_reviews.text: BUY THIS. Whether you’re looking for a duvet insert such as this, or simply a comforter and this has caught your eye, consider this product. It’s not super heavy and is VERY soft. Not issues were noted with the product upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite purchases on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: • a little heavy; perfect for winter times or if you sleep with the AC on in summer • soft & fluffy • have had for around 3 months, dogs have jumped on it aggressively and I have seen no rips. • first time sleeping with a duvet that was a little heavy and at first I felt a bit suffocated but slept like a BABY the rest of that night and nights following. • putting a duvet cover on top helps with keeping it clean. There’s a couple here on amazing that work amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C

customer_reviews.title: So comforting and so worth the purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these. 1 for each of my bedrooms. I wanted down but have a granddaughter who has severe allergies and asthma so I decided no down in the house. These alternatives are outstanding!! They are beautiful and fluffy right out of the bag!! They are soft and dreamy and so inexpensive... I don't know why it's taken me so long to buy them!! All that wonderful stuff being said, they are a bit warm for East Texas summer nights. We keep our home pretty cool but they seem a bit too heavy even with the thermostat set low. I still wouldn't be without them. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Gammie

customer_reviews.title: Hope this helps
customer_reviews.text: Love. I was skeptical at the time I purchased but ended up buying a great comforter. I was surprised at how soft it is and how heavy it is. I purchased the king, I knew it would be large but I imagined it being lighter in weight then it is. With that being said I wouldn’t say that it’s overly heavy either. It washed well in my washer at home. No issues. I would say it could be used in both winter and summer.
customer_reviews.author: SherbertM

customer_reviews.title: Quality, heavy, and nice price
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth buying for the price. I was looking for a comforter blanket thats heavier and not white. After looking, I found this product and it did not disappoint. Not only is the quality great, the price is amazing as well! I would say, if you're looking for something super light weight, this is not it. Hope yall find this helpful
customer_reviews.author: DEE

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap/horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: After following washing instructions. The comforter has tons of lose and broken strings. Looks cheap now with horrible quality. Not what I want in my guest bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Chad Warner

customer_reviews.title: HOT HOT HOT and SWEATY!
customer_reviews.text: I can never sleep in this. Even when its snowing and cold outside. It is just too damn hot. Now I guess this will be good for arctic weather, but even in 30 degree weather I wake up in sweat. My body gets extremely uncomfortable and just irritable with heat.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Damptey

customer_reviews.title: Once again received something someone opened to try out before shipping
customer_reviews.text: Opened the amazon box and sure enough the comforter was opened and already fluffed up. Apparently was used or someone opened to check it out prior to shipping it. Just the thought of having a possibly used item makes me quiver. Pros:It is nice and fluffy. Very soft. Cons: Don’t feel weighted like the description says. I have another down alternative comforter that is same weight and can tell my old one is a lot heavier.
customer_reviews.author: L.stan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent butter soft comforter!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST down comforter I have ever purchased. It feels sooo good against the skin. It is butter soft and fluffy. I can't bring myself to puting a cover on it because it feels so good. It is a warmer blanket so will have to use a sheet in summer. But perfect for all of the other seasons. I tend to be a hot sleeper, so may be perfect for majority of people. Cannot say enough of how happy I am with this purchase!! It is always a gamble ordering online,I am so glad that I took a chance on this one. Now time for some new pillowcases!
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but maybe too lightweight,
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my guest room as a friend was coming and I didn’t think the blankets I had were warm enough. My friend found it very comfortable and warm enough on top of the other blankets, Alone it might not have done the trick as heat in that room is not adequate. It is lightweight, but personally I prefer something a bit heavier. Hope it will wash well. I definitely cannot wash it in my home machine,
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Down Alternative Comforter!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a warm, but not too warm king sized blanket. Real goose down feathers can be too much for our allergies and noses so based on the reviews, I purchased this down alternative. It is super cozy and warm. The fabric covering is great, though we still need to put this through the washer to see how it holds up. We've put this comforter into an IKEA duvet cover and it looks great. The thickness of it works great and as it plummets down to 20 degrees in NYC, I add an extra fleece blanket under for some warmth. I can see how this will work great though through "all seasons", particularly in cooler temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: EmyS.

customer_reviews.title: My second comforter!  LOVE THIS THING
customer_reviews.text: I finally have time to leave the review for this product after brought one many years ago. Now that I brought another one, I think I should do my part and leave a review for this wonderful product. As you can tell from tone, I love this comforter. So much that I brought another one when my first one is old. This is very comfortable, and easy to clean. You can put it in your washer and dryer and it will be fine. It can keep warm during winter really well and not too hot during summer. I love this. BUY IT.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Tu

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: We were staying in old cabin on the Pacific Coast, with the chilly night, and I noticed that comforter provided was way warmer than my current down version at home. So, I unbuttoned the duvet cover and searched for the brand tag, naturally. Long story short - I replaced my old Pacific Down comforter with this Superior Down Alternative version and could not be happier. Great warmth, good mid-weight, and stuff does not shift - YAY!
customer_reviews.author: Elina Razd

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I can't stress enough how much I love this comforter. It's keeping me so warm. I haven't turned the heat on, and I'm staying warm as the outside temps are dropping into freezing. (My place is keeping steady at 50°C.). I'm a cold sleeper and this comforter is so soft and warm. Best purchase this year!
customer_reviews.author: audrey

customer_reviews.title: Warm and fluffy
customer_reviews.text: Totally in love with this comforter. It's fairly thick and fluffy and I think a nice medium warmth. I live in Northern California so it's not like we have crazy cold weather here, but it still gets very cool at night and this keeps me comfortable. Every now and then I'm still too chilly in it, but I am ALWAYS cold. My boyfriend runs really hot and it rarely gets too hot for him.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Kolafa

customer_reviews.title: TAS I AM WRITING THIS, IT IS 04/08/17. ...
customer_reviews.text: TAS I AM WRITING THIS, IT IS 04/08/17. I JUST FINISHED WASHING THIS PRODUCT, AND IT FELL APART. THE STUFFING IS COMING OUT, AND IT IS A MESS!!! I KNOW IT IS TO LATE TO RETURN IT, BUT WHAT A WAST OF MANEY. I WILL NEVER BUY ANOTHER PRODUCT FROM THIS COMPANY. MR. R. L. BLANTON
customer_reviews.author: RENIE BLANTON

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after one wash
customer_reviews.text: The comforter ripped — a huge gaping hole — after the very first wash. I followed the washing instructions on the tag, and now it’s ruined. The comforter is two months old. Beyond disappointing. Would have taken it to get professionally cleaned if the tag advised not to machine wash. How deceptive of the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle S.

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, comfy, and AFFORDABLE!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING PRICE! You can easily go to Bed Bath & Beyond and spend a fortune on a comforter. With this it is super affordable. Not only that but super soft, durable, and pretty. We have bought this for multiple of my kids’ beds! I love the white color and the soft fluff inside of each square in the comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L. Shore

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality; Closer to Heavy Weight than Mid Weight
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality product but it seems heavier than "mid-weight". Probably not going to be able to use it during the summer but great for the other three seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: received defective item
customer_reviews.text: Poorly sewn. There is a section on this comforter where something clearly went wrong with the sewing job. There are huges "loops" of thread that are still attached by both ends, and there are also "loose" threads attached by one end. Sending this one back and getting another in hopes to get a better quality one.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: 5 ☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.text: We use 2 x-long twins quilts on our king bed so we fon't fight over blankets. These quilts had over 4,000 positive Amazon ratings and mine will be the 40001 and 4002 ones. I'm amazed of the quality, especially for the price. Do not hesitate. This is 5☆ quality. Note: they are luxurious so fitting it in the washer could be tight, so I'd suggest buying 2 twins vs a king size.
customer_reviews.author: Bohemians with Wanderlust

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised by this duvet insert. I live in an area that gets rather cold and this is perfect right now with my regular sheets and no other blankets. It's very warm! I got the white and the color is true. The size is the full/queen and it over hangs my bed (full) but it doesn't touch the ground. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Eye

customer_reviews.title: The only comforter I'll ever own again.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing comforter ever. EVER. It arrived before the duvet cover that I ordered to put it in but after trying it out I don't think I even want the cover. It's so soft and heavier than our basic comforter that cost more from Kohl's. I love the weight of it which totally helps me sleep better and it's basically a ton of tiny pillows sewn together. It's super plushy, soft, and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: AntRiz44

customer_reviews.title: It is very soft and for the money is a very good deal. Because of the microfiber covering
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I find this comforter to be extremely warm despite setting our thermostat to a low temperature (62F) in the winter. It is very soft and for the money is a very good deal. Because of the microfiber covering, you will see some electrostatic sparking when you pull back the cover at night though you will not feel any type of shock.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Z.

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this comforter
customer_reviews.text: Had a hard time finding an alternative down comforter to fit my 2 ea Temperpedic xlong adjustable mattresses (used as a Cal King/King bed) that was light, warm, soft to the touch, and covers my entire bed generously on sides, top & bottom. This comforter fits all my requirements beyond expectations. Many I tried were heavy, top fabric very wrinkled, not big enough to fit my bed and much more expensive than this one. I highly recommend this comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Santos

customer_reviews.title: comfy
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy and fluffy. It is much warmer than I expected, will only be able to use on cold nights. i was expecting it to be for other than winter.
customer_reviews.author: HSV golfer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable. Also very warm
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is cloud like and amazing, but it was advertised as cooling and it’s probably the hottest comforter I’ve ever slept under. That being said, it’s a testament that I STILL love it and I look forward to getting cozy under it every night (despite the fact that I’m a hot sleeper.) Also, having read in some reviews that it falls apart when you put it in the washer, Ive been super hesitant to wash it, but one year later, I finally did it and it’s still just as fluffy and it held up perfectly!! Just follow the wash instructions. I can’t say enough good things about this comforter — I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and delightfully warm!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this comforter!!!!! Bought one initially to check it was all that everyone said it was and it did not disappoint so I bought 4 more for a cabin I am updating... Everyone commented on how soft and warm (but not too warm) they were and really enjoyed them... Going to buy another so I have it when it is needed... These comforters are so very soft, sort of like a cloud, and they feel heavenly... Very pleased with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and fluffy
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I bought this! I use mine inside a duvet cover but as soon as I took it out of the package I can see why people use this as their comforter it is super soft!! I really wanted a fluffy duvet insert without spending a lot of money and this is exactly what I got! It fluffs nicely and can be washed for easy cleaning. If you are looking for an affordable soft fluffy duvet insert please look no further this is it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order this comforter to keep Warm!
customer_reviews.text: What a great comforter. Due to allergies I can no longer use down. I liked the reviews of this comforter & decided to order. This comforter has well sown baffles & thick fluffy fill. It is amazingly warm & the Amazon price is so affordable.
customer_reviews.author: 2rivers

customer_reviews.title: Comforter Delight!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this comforter. I spent days online reviewing different reviews and decided to buy this one. I am so happy that I did. The comforter arrived quicker than I expected. Upon opening the package I feel in love with the softness. This comforter feels amazing, I really do want to stay in bed longer and just snuggle. I must say that although I live in Florida and summer is here, this comforter has the perfect temperature. I never feel too hot or sweaty under this blanket. I would recommend this comforter to anyone who is looking for a alternative down comforter. This is the perfect feel for a unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the King Size and it fits both sides of my bed very well! It's super soft and sooo fluffy! Seriously pictures don't do it any justice! I saw a bunch of other down comforters before purchasing this one but I'm sooo glad I did! It's actually a pretty heavy conforter! Haven't washed it yet, we'll see how that goes but for now I am ver pleased with my purchase! Will update in the future to see how it holds up!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anna

customer_reviews.title: Soft, warm, best comforter I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Not light weight, but i like heavy. Very comfortable and soft. I should of got summer and not year round. If you prefer winter over summer, this may be to warm for you. I sleep with just this comforter and sheets and sweat, constant off and on, or half my body out while sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: L. Vargas

customer_reviews.title: The best comforter I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is the best comforter I have ever bought. I have used quilts, comforters, and blankets but this is my first duvet style comforter and I am never going back. This comforter is so warm and heavy I love snuggling into it. All that loft and weight is a negative when the warmer weather sets in but we never sleep with a comforter in the summer any way. So when the weather is dreadful, we are snuggling with this top notch comforter. When the water is warm, it still looks great on the bed with my duvet cover  and we easily fold it down when we sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect weight...not too hot in the summer and keeps us warm in the colder months. That said, we live in CA so our winter doesn’t get much colder than 35 degrees outside. Glad we purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: ksully

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy, comfy but WARM!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this insert. I’ve been looking for one that’s not super expensive but will also resemble the “sleeping in a fluffy cloud” feeling. I want to give this 5 stars but it’s definitely a bit warm. We’ve used this for just under a week and 4 out of the 5 nights we’ve used it I’ve literally woke. Up in the middle of the night drenched in sweat the sheets were even soaked. Definitely not an all season duvet insert. Will have to look for one that’ll keep us a bit more cool during the summer, but this should do for the cold months in PA!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Stamos

customer_reviews.title: Great product quality, BUT product sizing is strangely incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Soft and comfortable and warm, great comforter for great price, BUT the King size is Queen/Twin size.....totally ruining product quality. I need a King-size...
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: This comforter is a nice buy depending on your needs and likes
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is a nice buy depending on your needs and likes. This is a very fluffy and WARM blanket! Now, my husband is always cold so this is great for him. I am always hot so for me its a little too warm. The blanket itself is nicely made and is bery fluffy. You can tell the difference with the microfiber vs Poly. I personally like the Poly better b/c of the cool feel it has. This comforter is well worth the price if you like warm blankets :) all depends on personal likes and dislikes.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna

customer_reviews.title: Super soft & comfy
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is so super soft! It definitely runs small. We ordered a king for our queen bed and it fits perfectly. I would've given this comforter a 5 star but i'm a little concerned with the stitching as there're more than few threads coming out. I just hope when we wash it it doesn't fall apart. We have had it about 3 weeks now. I also just ordered one for my sons bed. One more thing it says all season but its very warm. If you are only using this comforter, then maybe i could see all season ,but we have sheet,electric blanket then this, so its very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: First used this comforter when staying at a friend’s house and loved how cuddly, but lightweight, it is. Apparently I’m not the only one who thinks this because when I ordered one when returning back home, I learned my daughter (who was also visiting) ordered two for her home! I haven’t washed it yet and hoping like crazy it holds up well as I plan to keep this for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri-Dallas, TX

customer_reviews.title: Perfect year long comforter
customer_reviews.text: I live in Midwest, center of the US Midwest and this is a perfect year round comforter, not too thick or thin and not too bulky. I prefer the down alternative to true down feathers because down feathers protrude through and are irritating, plus they are more difficult to clean and maintain. I have had both and cannot tell any significant difference in warmth or comfort, so for me, the alternative down is the clear choice and less expensive. This is probably one of the best alternative comforters I've purchased. I want to get more for our guest bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Friedel

customer_reviews.title: Love having the King size for my Queen bed
customer_reviews.text: Love having the King size for my Queen bed. My bed is raised relatively high and I like the bit of extra on the sides, the picture shows it as it looks on my bed so I'd size up if you're looking for longer sides like that. All the normal issues with a cheaper down alternative, some loose threads after about 6 months. Its warm enough for Winter, Spring, Fall. Too warm for summer, as would be expected. The "fluff" has stayed put really well. I REALLY need to put a duvet on this, it would probably cut down on the wear and tear of the stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Kat S

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful & Warm!
customer_reviews.text: This Superior brand duvet insert/ comforter arrived well packed & brand new. It is a pure white with a medium thickness. It is heavy which keeps you very warm. If you live in a cold weather climate, you should definately buy this. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CalifGrl26

customer_reviews.title: Great one! High quality
customer_reviews.text: You will feel you have high quality comforter just with this price. It is very comfy, cozy and heavy enough to let you feel warm. I think it feels like the ones you see in high rated hotels. I loved them so I bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Manal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent comforter!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it yesterday, so it's only been one night, but so far so good! It's very soft and fluffy with the filling spread evenly throughout the comforter. It's a medium weight and just warm enough to feel cozy without being so hot as to need to stick out a leg for air. At this price, I'll be buying another for our guest bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cox

customer_reviews.title: Look NO farther! This is the Holy Grail of snuggles!
customer_reviews.text: I spent days going through reviews and longing for a comforter I had when I was 20. I settled on this but I was so scared! Well it arrived yesterday in perfect condition and fluffy as a cloud! I didn't realize it until now but I slept like a baby! My 12 lb Chiweenie LOVES to burrow under it and my 11 cat loves to lay in its fluffy goodness. My husband was happy as a bug in a rug and somewhere to the left of me (I could hear his snoring). My children were envious and now scoff at their IKEA ones. I might be in the market for a few more of these soon lol
customer_reviews.author: SpaceyLady =^･ｪ･^=

customer_reviews.title: So Soft and Fluffy
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is so fluffy and comfortable. I was trying to go for a large, fluffy duvet look and I think this comforter did it. I put mine in a duvet cover. This thing gets really really warm. As it gets warmer I'm going to switch to my lighter quilt. If you want something warm, comfy, and cozy, go with this comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: NICE BUT TOO LIGHT WEIGHT FOR US
customer_reviews.text: NICE BUT TOO LIGHT WEIGHT FOR US. NO PROBLEMS WITH RETURN.
customer_reviews.author: Tribblegal

customer_reviews.title: Last night was the first time I used this comfortable. Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Last night was the first time I used this comfortable. Loved it. I bought a twin size which is very big and perfect for one person. I love this comforter because it is heavier than others 5.9 Lbs. Before, I ordered a comforter which was 3.8 Lbs. but that was too light for me and I returned it. I need a warm comforter for winter and this weight feels very good especially when you put a duvet cover on. The only thing that is missing are hooks in the 4 corners to hook to the duvet, but it is not a problem, I will sew them myself.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Dolgin

customer_reviews.title: VERY warm comforter
customer_reviews.text: I really like how soft and fluffy the comforter is but it is so warm, definitely not an all season comforter for people who get warm easily. I didn't even realize I get warm easily, but I've woken up sweating for the last few nights since I've been using this comforter (never happened before with other comforters). Only NYC summer heat with AC all the way up. Trying to figure out if I want to return it and get a true all season comforter before I melt in my sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I am super happy about this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am super happy about this purchase. First, it shipped within a week. Second, it's exactly what I was looking for. It's fluffy, not too light and not too heavy, soft, not prickly from the feathers. I've been wanting a "hotel" quality duvet/blanket for a while, this is perfect. The quality is awesome for the price I got it at. I was surprised at how silky soft it is! Great purchase. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Does not tie into a duvet cover
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our guest room and it seems very nice and weighty, doesn't feel like a cheap comforter but it does not have places to tie onto the duvet cover! I sewed some ribbon loops on to keep it in place
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Lee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this comforter
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this comforter! LOVE LOVE LOVE! It is so warm and comfortable and I feel like a baby who has returned to the womb. There's no poking from down feathers (because there aren't any) but the quality is absolutely on par with any real down mattress I've ever used but I prefer this over them. The price is excellent. I've recommended this product to tons of people. The fabric is so soft and supple. Seriously stop questioning whether you should buy this and just get it. I can't see how anyone would regret it, especially considering what a great deal it is. You definitely won't beat the price and quality in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie McGinness

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Update: After using it for a week I am IN LOVE. This is the perfect comforter. I cannot recommend enough! Great comforter. Obviously not real down but incredibly soft and fluffy. I love the weight of this comforter but I’m not sure how I’m going to wash it. It is super warm which is a plus for me but maybe not for everyone. Overall I am happy with this purchase and would consider buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: JandA

customer_reviews.title: Shipped with product dirty and torn opeb
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my daughter the package came in dirty and torn open. I have not yet used product but am hoping after washing dirty will come out of white comforter. I'm so upset and embarrassed to give a gift half opened and dirty! Plus we will not be able to use the bag when we decide to change comforters for safe keeping.
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: So soft!! Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Great for sensitive skin!! I have very sensitive skin, and almost ALL fabrics feel rough to me. I can sleep with this touching my skin directly and have no issues at all, it is so soft my husband and I didn't use a top sheet. Also, it seems to be of great quality, with the batting actually sewn down, so washing it will be no problem. Does not make annoying "crunchy" sounds when turning over as you sleep, and the weight of the blanket was surprisingly heavy for a down alternative comforter, but it made it that much nicer, especially in cold weather like we have in my state. Besides coming on time, this blanket was AWESOME!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen G

customer_reviews.title: Really good but not really machine washable
customer_reviews.text: We really love this comforter, it was a good price and just as comfortable as more expensive ones. HOWEVER, we’ve now had to buy two because it says machine washable and tumble dry low which we did and it caused a large hole to be burned through it. I would be very very careful calling this machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Well and truly amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is hardly the first time that I have purchased a comforter on which I won't spend the premium prices. I'm generally pleased and do spend enough to expect a decent cover. I am still absolutely thrilled with this duvet. The microfiber cover material has a feel like a blend of silk and fine Egyptian cotton; it's smooth like silk but with body like cotton. Even better is the microfiber filling. This filling is a perfect density, I think that it's 100oz, and evenly distributed. It really reminds me of some wonderful times in good bed and breakfasts! Now I'm going to invest in a duvet cover to help keep this cloud heavenly.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Great warm comforter
customer_reviews.text: I have to agree with most of the reviews that I read about this comforter. It is soft and fluffy and very comfortable and warm. It does not breathe as well as down so I don't believe it is all season. I knew this from the reviews going in and I wanted a warm comforter so I am happy with my purchase. If you want a true all-season comforter, I'd say this is not for you but if you want a warm comforter, this is great! Also, I haven't washed it yet so I can't say yet how well it wears.
customer_reviews.author: Mark F.

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter
customer_reviews.text: So nice; perfect weight, fills out our duvet cover well. Really great value for the price. Can get a bit warm in summertime, but it's a big fluffy comforter after all! Still comfortable in weather that isn't super-hot (we have it on our bed and the weather has been 90-100 degrees this July and August - as long as indoors is under 80 degrees, we're good). So pleased with it, and looking forward to winter when its fluffy warmth will be that much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amy N-K

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn't excited about this item, I preferred to have a color choice, but I can just get a cover. It doesn't have ties, but stays put inside my duvet covers. Lightweight and sooo soft
customer_reviews.author: T. chicago

customer_reviews.title: Now This is a Cloud Comforter
customer_reviews.text: I made a huge mistake of purchasing a comforter that is called a "cloud comforter" and costs almost 4 times this one. I was very disappointed with it so I decided to try this one, knowing Amazon returns are so easy, it was worth the chance. This comforter is exactly what I was looking for. Fluffy, washable, warm but not hot, breathable....I am in love.
customer_reviews.author: Brit xo

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The comforter came packaged very well! The quality so far is excellent and I was very pleased with the comforter's fluff. This comforter isn't some thin version that doesn't fill your duvet cover. I am very satisfied with this product and would recommend this comforter to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping in a cloud
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously soft and warm - I searched for a long time for a comforter that was as thick and fluffy as a cloud, while not being super expensive. This one was perfect. I have a decorative duvet cover and almost did not want to use it because the material of this comforter itself is so incredibly soft. I just wanted to touch it forever. If I did not have three pets (which is why I have a machine washable duvet cover) I would gladly just sleep with this comforter all by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and comfortable - highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We've had this comforter for about 2 months now and love it. It keeps us nice and warm during the cold West Virginia winters. It is quite heavy, very comfortable, and has held it shape well (material stays where it should). The title says that it is a all season comforter but I don't think we'll be using this in the summer months which is actually okay. I wanted something warm and that is what we got. Overall I'm very happy with this this purchase and would certainly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: wvrktguy

customer_reviews.title: A Product of fast and poor quality production
customer_reviews.text: I received the comforter today and decided to return immediately; there is no properly finished stitch, the filling material comes out from all edges. Thickness is ok, color is not bright white but grayish... Another lesson not to rely on Amazon's high ratings!
customer_reviews.author: Set Menu

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the most AMAZING comforter I've ever own. I'm on my 3rd one only bc of house hold messes but this comforter is SO soft and creates the perfect temperature!!
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Great winter comforter in GA
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter after many researches. When I got the item, I was happy. It is very light weight. Although not as fluffy as I was expecting, it definitely gave my daughter the warmth my daughter needs. She had hard time to get out the bed in the morning due to she feels so comfortable on bed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lalaland

customer_reviews.title: The fluffiness and the fit were the most important!
customer_reviews.text: I used this comforter as a duvet insert. It is everything that it said it was! I was more than satisfied! It fit perfectly. You need to measure your duvet cover, and make sure that you are getting a good fit. Not all comforters are the same size. I had to look a while to find the right fit for my duvet cover.
customer_reviews.author: The D.

customer_reviews.title: They wanted to say thank you for buying their product and if Im not 100% happy with it they wanted to know what they could ...
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted one of these and it finally arrived. The same day I received the comforter I also received an email from the company I bought it from. They wanted to say thank you for buying their product and if Im not 100% happy with it they wanted to know what they could do to fix that. Now that's customer service. I loved it! And by the way... I LOVE my new comforter! It is so soft and comfortable! My dog and I didn't want to get out from under it this morning. I would DEFINITELY recommend this product and this company!
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: So soft and fluffy
customer_reviews.text: I cannot express how much I love this blanket! It’s lightweight yet warm! The material is soft and it seems well-made. I’ve only washed it once so far and hope it holds up well over time.
customer_reviews.author: thriftyveganeats

customer_reviews.title: So fluffy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous to purchase my first down comforter online but this was SUCH a good purchase! Great quality and you get wayyy more than what you pay for as far as quality. LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered. Worth double the money and more.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. Just what I wanted and ordered. I read tons of reviews on all the other Duvet Inserts, this one had the most 5 star reviews. I'm so happy I purchased it. Big and fluffy, white and and beautiful. Exactly like the picture. My husband helped me get it all set up inside my new Duvet cover and it fit like they were made for each other. We slept under it last night and it was the perfect temperature. It was -12 degrees last night with the wind chill but my hubby and I were warm and cozy under our new comforter. Thank you Grand Down.
customer_reviews.author: Brunette Beauty

product_meta.title: SUPERIOR Solid White Down Alternative Comforter, Duvet Insert, Medium Weight for All Season, Fluffy, Warm, Soft & Hypoallergenic - Full/Queen Bed
product_meta.description:
Size:Full/Queen| Color:White



A comforter made not only to be used all year round but for those looking to sleep in the clouds. The versatile solid white shell will not show through Superior's collection of beautiful and high quality duvet covers, and looks bright and fresh on its own. The soft microfiber is wrinkle resistant and feels silky smooth, for a picture perfect look right out of the dryer. Our lightweight microfiber cover and lofty down alternative fill allow air to circulate for a breathable bed that is warm enough for the winter, but stays remarkably cool in the warmer months. 

The shell is constructed from ultra thin fibers which are tightly woven into a strong, durable fabric that resists stains, fading, and wrinkles. Superior's down alternative fill is allergy and asthma friendly, and will provide relief to customers sensitive to goose down comforters. And with a baffle box and box stitch design, the filling will not shift, ensuring an even cover throughout the entire night. Our durable comforter is easy to clean, while still providing the luxurious feel of pure down bedding.
feature_bullets: SUBTLE SOFTNESS: With an ultra soft shell made of the finest 100% Microfiber and lofty Down Alternative Polyfill, this comforter / duvet insert excels in comfort. The microfiber shell is luxuriously soft and noiseless, and the hypoallergenic fill provides relief for those with allergies to goose down and feather bedding

PERFECT FIT: This King comforter measures a generous 108" x 90" and contains 100 oz of fill, making it perfect for year round use. Pair it with one of Superior's many beautiful duvet cover sets, or use it on its own for a clean, hotel-inspired look

CLASSIC STYLE: Complete your bedroom set with Superior's collection of mattress toppers, mattress protectors, blankets, and pillows. Our wide range of premium quality down alternative and memory foam bedding will make your bed so cozy, you'll never want to leave.Total weight: 7.5 pounds.Size: 88” x 90” (full/queen)

EASE OF CARE: The baffle box construction, crafted with double needle stitching, prevents our fill from shifting. This beautiful comforter is machine washable, and can be tumble dried on low heat to re-fluff. We recommend removing all bedding promptly from dryer to reduce any wrinkling. Always follow care label instructions for best results

GUARANTEE: PLEASE CHECK "SOLD BY" SELLER NAME.  Superior and Grand Down products are not distributed internationally so please only purchase from a retailer that is based in the US.  If your order arrives from an overseas shipper please know you did NOT purchase a Superior or Grand Down product. If your order arrives from a domestic location please confirm that  it says Superior or Grand Down on the care label as well as HOME CITY INC as the manufacturer. If it does not, please contact Amazon and us immediately

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars4,385 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
